# INRestaurantReservationUserBookingStatus.confirmed

**Case**

The restaurant accepted the reservation.

## Declaration

```swift
case confirmed
```

## Constants

- **INRestaurantReservationUserBookingStatus.pending**: The restaurant hasn’t confirmed or denied the reservation.
- **INRestaurantReservationUserBookingStatus.denied**: The restaurant declined the reservation.

items.description: The restaurant hasn’t confirmed or denied the reservation.
